span.span: Why Olfen ISD?
Earn an Associate Degree with us for free via dual credit at Olfen!
4-Day School Week Rocks! (5th Day is Optional; tranportation provided)
Small class sizes allow for individualized attention and constant participation.
Rigorous data-driven academics - monitored via DMAC data system.
Computer labs, tablets, and laptops available to prepare students for the future.
Safe environment - bullying is not tolerated among the Mustang Family.
Transportation: San Angelo, Ballinger, Eola, Miles, Rowena, & Paint Rock.
Â WE ARE THE SMALL SCHOOL
Want to join our Mustang family?
